text: Halle Berry stunned fans with photos of her leg ( and butt ) revealing dress at the Kingsman premiere in London Monday, and she's grabbing attention again with a cuddly, black - and - white shot with her new beau. Berry made her relationship with British music producer Alex Da Kid Instagram official Tuesday with the romantic pic. My balance A post shared by Halle Berry ( @ halleberry ) on Sep 19, 2017 at 11 : 00am PDT In the photo's caption, Berry simply wrote, ` ` My balance.'' Alex Da Kid also posted the photo with an almost identical caption Tuesday. My..... balance... A post shared by alexdakidofficial ( @ alexdakidofficial ) on Sep 19, 2017 at
